/*Fibbious Prime*/
#include "stdio.h"
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define ll long long unsigned int
ll r()
{
	ll x=0;
	char c=gc();
	while(c<48||c>57)
	c=gc();
	while(c>=48&&c<=57)
	{
		x=x*10+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}	
return x;
}
void m(ll q)
{
	ll rev=0,i,x,ct=0,n=q;
	if(n==0)
	{
	    pc('0');
	    pc('\n');
	    return;
	}
	while(n%10==0)
	{
		++ct;
		n/=10;
	}	
	while(q)
	{
		rev=rev*10+q%10;
		q/=10;
	}	
	while(rev)
	{
		pc(rev%10+48);
		rev/=10;
	}
	while(ct--)
	pc('0');
	pc('\n');
}
ll A[]={2, 3, 5, 13, 89, 233, 1597, 28657, 514229, 433494437};
int main()
{
	ll n;
	n=r();
	m(A[n-1]);
	return 0;
}
